name: Korean Adventures in Russia
description:
Korean Adventures in Russia is a single-player click and point adventure type of game based on a story. The game has unique pixel art and gets you involved in the situations that happen to the heroes in their search for new ideas for songs. The current controls are the mouse (to click on the in-game object and choose) and the keyboard (to show the settings).

Staytyan has learned that her favorite band is going from South Korea to mysterious Russia as they have lost their inspiration and decided to look for new ideas for their songs there. As a true fan, she is determined to follow them in whatever kind of adventures awaits them on their way...

MAIN GAME FEATURES:
- Follow the adventures of the heroes and help them,
- Learn interesting things,
- Get involved in the story,
- Enjoy the art on each level,
- Solve different puzzles,
- And have fun!
